Startups should partner with health systems to assist in defraying some of the cost in exchange for an equity position. #BeckersCIO16
Healthcare growth in the future will need CIO's and IT at the table to drive the necessary transformation   #BeckersCIO16
Paradigm shift--we need to be thankful that patients came to see us as opposed to patients being grateful we saw them. #BeckersCIO16
Technology is complex--need to simplify the discussion when engaging with Boards and the c-suite #BeckersCIO16
When discussing initiatives with the CEO/CFO be transparent and shift discussion from ROI to outcomes -volume to value #BeckersCIO16
Build your relationship with the CEO/CFO early. The need for a relationship is only realized a day after you need it.  #BeckersCIO16
Clinical leaders in IT roles facilitate the blurring of lines between IT and clinical environments #BeckersCIO16
Boards and c-suite are asking for information from all our data and information systems-we are data rich but information poor. #BeckersCIO16
We must drive to making our technology easier for physicians and patients/consumers to use. #BeckersCIO16
The c-suite must be engaged and knowledgable around Cybersecurity and Ransomeware #BeckersCIO16
How committed are you to enterprise data loss prevention? We must secure our networks #BeckersCIO16
